Plot: Claire becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group while grappling with her own, very raw personal tragedy.
Title: Cake
Actors: Jennifer Aniston, Adriana Barraza, Anna Kendrick, Sam Worthington
tomatoConsensus: Cake finds Jennifer Aniston making the most of an overdue opportunity to test her dramatic chops, but it lacks sufficient depth or warmth to recommend for all but her most ardent fans.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.
